definition: Shijing, the Book of Songs, early collection of Chinese poems and one of the Five Classics of Confucianism 五經|五经[Wu3 jing1]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
surname Jing

sentences.english: Described in the book of songs for "a roll here, o the wind from the south" drifting.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》中描述此地爲“有卷者阿，飄風自南”。

sentences.english: Understanding Zhouese cultural concept is the important premise of deep research on ShiJing .
sentences.chinese: 清理周人的文化觀念是深入探究《詩經》的重要前提。

sentences.english: The ancient “Book of Songs” needs to be reinterpreted for the young people.
sentences.chinese: 對青年人來說，古代的《詩經》需要做新的解釋。

sentences.english: GUAN JU took a distinct place in Book of Songs.
sentences.chinese: 《關雎》在《詩經》中佔有獨特的地位。

sentences.english: " Hejian Chang Mao's hometown, "Book of Songs, " the spread of land.
sentences.chinese: 河間是毛萇的故鄉，《詩經》的傳播地。

sentences.english: The Book of Songs is the earliest collection of poems and songs in China.
sentences.chinese: 詩經是中國歷史上第一部詩歌總集。

sentences.english: Tom: Absolutely, The Book of Songs is one of the earliest anthologies of verse in china.
sentences.chinese: 沒錯，《詩經》是最早的一部詩歌總集。

sentences.english: The Reiterative Locutions in 《The Book of songs》account for quite a proportion.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》中雙音迭詞，在經文中佔很大比重。

sentences.english: Shijing translation has a long history, with rather complicated translational phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》翻譯歷史悠久，現象亦尤爲複雜。

sentences.english: The study of The Book of Songs presents the disordered quality.
sentences.chinese: 當前《詩經》研究呈現出一種無序性。

sentences.english: The author of The Book of Songs didn't have awareness of using analogy.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》的作者在創作之初本來沒有興的概念。

sentences.english: Association is a unique literary phenomenon in "The Book of Songs".
sentences.chinese: 興象是《詩經》中特有的文學現象。

sentences.english: The Farming Poetry in The book of songs is the outcome of the agriculture culture in the Zhou dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《詩經》農事詩是周代農業文化背景下的產物。

sentences.english: Jerry: Oh, I see, something like the The Book of Songs?
sentences.chinese: 哦，我知道了，像《詩經》那種吧？

sentences.english: All previous dynasties scholar to "Poetry" research huge collection of books , too numerous to cite individually.
sentences.chinese: 歷代學者對《詩經》的研究可謂汗牛充棟，不勝枚舉。

sentences.english: Recently many people have made a deep research on Book op Odes.
sentences.chinese: 前人對《詩經》進行了深入研究和詳盡考釋。

definition: Chu Ci, the Songs of Chu (ancient book of poems, collected during Han but esp. from country of Chu c. 500 BC)
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse
History of the Former Han Dynasty, second of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], composed by Ban Gu 班固[Ban1 Gu4] in 82 during Eastern Han (later Han), 100 scrolls
Zhuangzi (369-286 BC), Daoist author
the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
Classic of Rites
document
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
Four Books, namely: the Great Learning 大學|大学, the Doctrine of the Mean 中庸, the Analects of Confucius 論語|论语, and Mencius 孟子
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
the Rites of Zhou (in Confucianism)
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
verse/CL:行[hang2]
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
